name: Evening Desert Safari
description: Experience the golden hour magic with exhilarating dune bashing, authentic camel rides, and a sumptuous BBQ dinner under the stars
full_description: Our Evening Desert Safari is the perfect introduction to the Arabian desert. Begin your adventure with thrilling dune bashing in a 4x4 Land Cruiser, followed by a serene camel ride as the sun sets over the golden dunes. End your evening at our traditional Bedouin-style camp with live entertainment, henna painting, and a delicious BBQ dinner featuring local and international cuisine.
included: Unlimited soft drinks, water, tea, and coffee

name: Overnight Desert Safari
description: Immerse yourself in the desert with a full night experience including camping, stargazing, and traditional Arabian hospitality
full_description: Experience the desert like never before with our Overnight Safari. Watch the sunset while dune bashing, enjoy a traditional BBQ dinner with entertainment, and sleep under a blanket of stars in comfortable Bedouin-style tents. Wake up to a stunning sunrise and savor a delicious breakfast before heading back to the city.

name: Morning Desert Safari
description: Beat the heat with an early morning adventure featuring dune bashing, sandboarding, and camel rides in cooler temperatures
full_description: Start your day with an adrenaline rush in the cool morning desert. Perfect for those who want to avoid the heat, this safari includes thrilling dune bashing, sandboarding down the dunes, and a peaceful camel ride through the golden landscape. Light refreshments are included.

name: VIP Premium Desert Safari
description: Luxury desert experience with private vehicle, premium seating, gourmet dining, and exclusive entertainment
full_description: Indulge in the ultimate desert luxury with our VIP Premium Safari. Enjoy private transportation in a luxury 4x4, reserved premium seating at the camp, a gourmet five-course dinner prepared by our chef, and exclusive live entertainment. This is the perfect choice for those seeking an elevated desert experience.

name: Family Desert Adventure
description: Perfect family-friendly desert experience with gentle activities, kids entertainment, and family-oriented dining
full_description: Our Family Desert Adventure is specially designed for families with children. Enjoy gentle dune bashing, short camel rides, sand castle building, and family-friendly entertainment. Children get special kid's entertainment and meals are family-oriented with plenty of options for all ages.

name: Luxury Desert Spa Experience
description: Ultimate relaxation in the desert with spa treatments, private dining, and luxury accommodations
full_description: Indulge in the ultimate desert luxury with our Spa Experience. Enjoy professional spa treatments in desert tents, private dining with gourmet cuisine, luxury accommodations, and personalized service. This is the perfect way to relax and rejuvenate in the Arabian desert.

name: Adventure Quad Biking Safari
description: Thrilling quad biking adventure through massive sand dunes with professional instructors and safety equipment
full_description: Experience the ultimate adrenaline rush with our Quad Biking Safari. Race through massive sand dunes at high speeds under the guidance of professional instructors. Includes all safety equipment, ATV maintenance, and a BBQ dinner to celebrate your adventure.

name: Romantic Sunset Experience
description: Intimate couples experience with private dining, champagne, and breathtaking desert sunset views
full_description: Create unforgettable memories with your loved one during our Romantic Sunset Experience. Enjoy a private camel ride at golden hour, a gourmet dinner for two with champagne, and stargazing from a premium viewing platform. Perfect for proposals, anniversaries, or special celebrations.

name: Cultural Heritage Tour
description: Deep dive into Bedouin culture with traditional crafts, storytelling, and authentic Arabian hospitality
full_description: Immerse yourself in the rich Bedouin heritage with our Cultural Heritage Tour. Learn traditional crafts like weaving and pottery, listen to ancient stories around the campfire, and experience genuine Arabian hospitality. Includes traditional tea ceremonies and cultural performances.

name: Extreme Desert Challenge
description: Ultimate adventure combining quad biking, sandboarding, and overnight camping for thrill-seekers
full_description: Push your limits with our Extreme Desert Challenge. Combine high-speed quad biking, extreme sandboarding down massive dunes, and an overnight adventure under the stars. Perfect for adrenaline junkies seeking the ultimate desert experience.

name: Dream Desert Safari
description: The ultimate desert fantasy experience with helicopter transfer, private oasis, and bespoke luxury services
full_description: Turn your desert dreams into reality with our Dream Desert Safari. Experience the ultimate luxury with helicopter transfers, a private desert oasis, bespoke dining experiences, and personalized services. This exclusive package includes everything you could imagine for the perfect Arabian adventure.
included: Private desert oasis with luxury tent
Luxury spa treatments in desert setting

name: Budget Desert Adventure
description: Affordable desert experience with all essential activities included, perfect for budget-conscious travelers
full_description: Experience the magic of the desert without breaking the bank with our Budget Desert Adventure. This comprehensive package includes all the essential desert activities at a fraction of the cost of luxury packages, making desert exploration accessible to everyone.

name: Adventure Quad Safari
description: High-octane quad biking experience through massive dunes with professional training and safety equipment
full_description: Unleash your inner adventurer with our Adventure Quad Safari. Race through towering sand dunes on powerful quad bikes, experience the thrill of desert racing, and push your limits in one of the most exciting desert activities available.

name: Desert Camping Under Stars
description: Authentic desert camping experience with stargazing, traditional Bedouin tents, and desert wildlife spotting
full_description: Immerse yourself in the tranquility of the desert with our authentic camping experience. Sleep under a blanket of stars in traditional Bedouin tents, learn about desert wildlife, and experience the peacefulness of the Arabian desert at night.

name: Photography Desert Tour
description: Specialized photography tour capturing stunning desert landscapes, wildlife, and traditional Bedouin life
full_description: Capture the breathtaking beauty of the Arabian desert with our specialized Photography Desert Tour. Led by professional photographers, this tour takes you to the most picturesque locations for stunning shots of dunes, wildlife, and traditional desert life.

name: Desert Wellness Retreat
description: Relaxing desert experience combining meditation, yoga, and holistic wellness activities in serene surroundings
full_description: Find inner peace and rejuvenation in the tranquil desert with our Desert Wellness Retreat. Combine gentle desert activities with meditation, yoga, and holistic wellness practices for a truly restorative experience.

name: Desert Festival Experience
description: Immersive cultural festival in the desert with traditional music, dance performances, and festive celebrations
full_description: Experience the vibrant culture of the UAE with our Desert Festival Experience. Join traditional music performances, folk dances, and cultural celebrations that bring the spirit of Arabian heritage to life in the stunning desert setting.
